entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow showers are possible about the summit for a time Friday morning and again late afternoon and up to 1cm may accumulate on the road at times.

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow showers possible to 900 metres this morning, lowering to 700 metres this evening. 8 to 15 cm of snow may settle on the road near the summit with lesser amounts down to 700 metres.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Period of snow this morning and an additional 2 to 3 cm expected on the road near the summit. Another period of snow is possible from tonight until early Saturday morning and a further 2 to 4 cm may settle on the road near the summit.

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Southwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Southwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Impact: Damage to trees, powerlines, and unsecured structures possible. Driving may be difficult, especially for high-sided vehicles and motorcycles. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: High.
